verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Out of the morning, in-to the night, Thirty and three rode off to put the dread Foe to flight led by the hand of Jenna Thirty and three rode side by side, And by the moonlight fortified.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: "Fight on, my sisters," Jenna cried. "Fight for the Great White Alts." The blood flowed swift, like good red wine, As sisters took the battle line. "This kingdom I will claim for mine And for the heart of Alta!"

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Thirty and three rode out that day To hold the dreaded foe at bay, But never more they passed this Led by the hand of Jenna.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Yet still, some say, in the darkest night The sisters can be heard to fight And you will see a flash of white, The long white braid of Jenna.
